#summary meter low attribute
#labels about-html,is-html-attribute,from-whatwg

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > [MeterElement <meter> element] > *low attribute*

== Usage ==

The meter low attribute specifies the range that is considered to be the "low" part.

== Values ==

The meter low attribute must be a [http://www.whatwg.org/specs/web-apps/current-work/multipage/infrastructure.html#valid-floating-point-number valid floating point number].

== Elements ==

You can use the `low` attribute on the following elements:

  * [MeterElement <meter>]
